titleStmt.title: A description of the ciuill vvarres of England [collected by Iohn Speede, citizen of London, anno 1600]
titleStmt.author: Speed, John, 1552?-1629.

notesStmt.note: Text in 4 sheets is pasted to margins of engraved map, "The invasions of England and Ireland with all their civill warrs since the Conquest", dedicated to Sir Oliver St. John knight (who was knighted in 1601)-- Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
